subject: Hockey, Ice
Tattoos
lead_paragraph: Getting a hockey-related tattoo is not mandatory at Tattoo Lou’s Penalty Box, a new booth at select Islanders home games, but “Potvin Forever” has a nice ring to it.
snippet: Getting a hockey-related tattoo is not mandatory at Tattoo Lou’s Penalty Box, a new booth at select Islanders home games, but “Potvin Forever” has a nice ring to it.
